knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r}
library(readr)
data <- read.csv('/Users/athervgole/Downloads/cities_1.csv')
View(data)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dbplyr)
library(psych)
```


```{r}
tax_pop_lm<-lm(Total.Tax.Revenue~total_population, data=data)
summary(tax_pop_lm)
data1 <- data #preserve original data frame, create copy data1
data1 <- data1[complete.cases(data1[,17:18]),]
data1 <- data1 %>% mutate(pred = predict(tax.pop.lm, .)) %>% 
  mutate(Total.Tax.Revenue = ifelse(is.na(Total.Tax.Revenue),pred,Total.Tax.Revenue)) 
```

```{r}
cities_nona <- cities %>% filter(!is.na(Total.Tax.Revenue))
taxrev_model <- lm(Total.Tax.Revenue ~ Total.Population, data = cities_nona)
```


```{r}
write.csv(data1,'cities_updated.csv')
```
